Welcome to velocyto.py!¶

Velocyto is a library for the analysis of RNA velocity.

Velocyto includes a command line tool and an analysis pipeline

Warning

This documentation page refers to an alpha (0.9.5) version of the software. Use at your own risk. Please report issues on our Github page.
